info.name: Aseedak Complete API Collection v2.4
info.description: Complete API collection for Aseedak word elimination game - All endpoints organized by category including character management, character packs, word decks, enhanced store functionality, FCM push notifications, and in-app purchases

response.name: Example
response.body:
{
  "decks": [
    {
      "id": "deck_id",
      "name": "Deck_1",
      "description": "Default deck for legacy words",
      "price": 0,
      "isActive": true,
      "wordCount": 20,
      "isPaid": false,
      "isPurchased": false
    },
    {
      "id": "deck_id_2",
      "name": "Premium Deck",
      "description": "Challenging words",
      "price": 1999,
      "isActive": true,
      "wordCount": 30,
      "isPaid": true,
      "isPurchased": true
    }
  ]
}
